T02D1889:203a-3: de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba /
T02D1889:203a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1889:203a-5: dpe med bde ba'i ngo bo dpal gyi gnas gyur gnas 'dren pa //
T02D1889:203a-6: dpe med lha mo bcu yi ngo bo rig dang rig par bcas //
T02D1889:203a-7: srid pa gsum phan bde ba thob mdzad 'gyur min 'gyur ba med //
T02D1889:203a-8: ji srid re ba snang bar phyag na padma rgyal
T02D1889:203a-9: gyur cig / dpal ldan sngags kyi gzhung lugs mdzes
T02D1889:203a-10: pa'i dbang bzhi'i ngo bo dag / rab tu gsal
T02D1889:203a-11: ba'i sgras stong gyur pas gang gis mi shes shing
T02D1889:203a-12: // du ma'i man ngag bdun gyi dbye ba'i tshogs kyis yongs 'khrugs pa //
T02D1889:203a-13: de dag rnams kyi gsal bar rtogs par bya phyir 'bad pas bya //
T02D1889:203a-14: de nyid bsgrub bya'i ngo bor rig pa la //
T02D1889:203a-15: mu stegs ma lus blo rnams rnam par 'khrul //
T02D1889:203a-16: de las rig byed mthar ni smra ba yi //
T02D1889:203a-17: skye bo rnams ni de nyid mchog ces smra //
T02D1889:203a-18: dga' ba'i ngo bo rang rig mi g-yo zhing /
T02D1889:203a-19: bsgrub byar 'dod pa rig byed mtha' can pa'o //
T02D1889:203a-20: nyan thos rang rgyal bcas pa gzugs la sogs //
T02D1889:203a-21: phung po dag dang bral ba bsgrub byar 'dod //
T02D1889:203a-22: rnam pas stong pa nam mkha' zla ba'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D1889:203a-23: so sor rang rig snying rje'i rang bzhin ca //
T02D1889:203a-24: mdzes pa'i mtshan rnams kyis brgyan don mdzad pa //
T02D1889:203a-25: sbyin la sogs pa'i rgyu mthun bde bral ba //
T02D1889:203b-0: sbyin sogs pha rol @203b phyin drug tshul gnas pa //
T02D1889:203b-1: dka' bcas sku ni mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan //
T02D1889:203b-2: sa bcur bzhugs pas yang dag longs spyod pa //
T02D1889:203b-3: 'gro don mdzad pa bsgrub byar rab tu smra //
T02D1889:203b-4: sbyin sogs yon tan ma lus yongs rdzogs pa //
T02D1889:203b-5: rdzogs sangs mdzad pa ma lus mdzad nas ni //
T02D1889:203b-6: gang zhig yang dag mtha' ni mngon mdzad pa //
T02D1889:203b-7: 'gog pa'i ngo bo bsgrub bya yang dag yod //
T02D1889:203b-8: nyid mtshungs lha mos 'khyud cing 'gro ba yi //
T02D1889:203b-9: don mdzad bde sdug nyid bral ngo bo nyid ;
T02D1889:203b-10: / sku ni dpe byang bzang po brgyad cus brgyan //
T02D1889:203b-11: rtog pa dang bral bsgrub byar rab tu 'chad //
T02D1889:203b-12: dang po nyid nas lha yi rnam pa dag / khyad par gyis stong bde ba yang dag bsgom //
T02D1889:203b-13: gsal 'gyur bde chen 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa //
T02D1889:203b-14: yid bzhin nor bur grags pa kha cig smra //
T02D1889:203b-15: rang bdag bde ba'i ngo bo mngon byas nas //
T02D1889:203b-16: phyes btang bde btsam zhig 'bras 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1889:203b-17: dag pa mngon sum byed par nus med nas //
T02D1889:203b-18: de phyir bdag po'i rnam pa bsgom pa yin //
T02D1889:203b-19: sku ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs yan lag mtshan gyis brgyan //
T02D1889:203b-20: dpe med bde bas gang ba nyid dang mtshungs par 'dus pa dang /
T02D1889:203b-21: thub pa'i dbang po 'phro bas bsams can rnams kyi don mdzad pa //
T02D1889:203b-22: chad pas stong pa bsgrub bya nyid du gzhan dag rab tu smra ;
T02D1889:203b-23: / rang bdag bde ba'i ngo bo mngon byas nas //
T02D1889:203b-24: btang snyoms ngo bo ye shes tsam 'bras bu //
T02D1889:203b-25: 'khor ba srid zhugs sems can don mdzad pa //
T02D1889:203b-26: yid bzhin nor grags gcig tu zhi gyur pa'o //
T02D1889:203b-27: dkyil 'khor bde gang mngon sum byas nas ni //
T02D1889:203b-28: phyis ni de rang 'dod pas nges ldog pa //
T02D1889:203b-29: sems can don yang yod de 'dir med min //
T02D1889:203b-30: gang phyir nges par ldog pas rab tu byung //
T02D1889:203b-31: de rnams las 'dod ngo bo gsal byas la //
T02D1889:203b-32: phyir ni 'gog pas 'bras bu kha cig smra //
T02D1889:203b-33: gang phyir 'gog pa'i ngo bo tha dad min //
T02D1889:203b-34: de phyir tha dad phyogs kyi'am tha dad med //
T02D1889:203b-35: shes rab ye shes phyis ni byang chub sems //
T02D1889:203b-36: ro myang dbang bzhir 'chad pa de mchog min //
T02D1889:203b-37: gang phyir bsgom sogs kun stsol don med pa //
T02D1889:203b-38: thob 'gyur de 'bras rab tu mi rung phyir //
T02D1889:203b-39: shes rab ye shes phyir ni dga' ba'i ro //
T02D1889:203b-40: myong rnyed dbang bskur bzhir smra de dman te //
T02D1889:204a-1: bsgom sogs kun la rab tu stsol //
T02D1889:204a-2: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs 'bras med rab thal 'gyur //
T02D1889:204a-3: rdo rje'i sa bon dri med dga' 'bab pa //
T02D1889:204a-4: dag pa'i chu skyes yang dag myu gu 'byung rgyas shing //
T02D1889:204a-5: bzhi pa'i 'bru ni yongs gsal smin 'gyur ba'i //
T02D1889:204a-6: bzhi pa dag ni mkhas pa rnams la sbas //
T02D1889:204a-7: gsal byed bdud rtsi lnga dang thig le zla ba dang /
T02D1889:204a-8: smin dbus thig le las byung dkyil 'khor dang //
T02D1889:204a-9: rlung gi rang bzhin lce'u chung sogs de nyid //
T02D1889:204a-10: ngo bo min pa bdag nyid kyis rtag tu //
T02D1889:204a-11: rmi lam mig 'phrul gzugs brnyan sgyu ma dang ;
T02D1889:204a-12: / smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer chu zla dang //
T02D1889:204a-13: gzhan gyi sgra yis mngon par brjod pa yis //
T02D1889:204a-14: 'dir bshad bsgrub bya gzhan la yod ma yin //
T02D1889:204a-15: zab mo stong nyid so sor snang ba tsam //
T02D1889:204a-16: zhi ba shin tu phra ba sgras brjod min //
T02D1889:204a-17: gos med dngos bral dri med la sogs dang //
T02D1889:204a-18: gzhan sgrub yod pa 'khrul par mi bya'o ;
T02D1889:204a-19: / rnam pa bdun po bkod pa'i ngo bo dag las nam mkha' ma lus pa'i //
T02D1889:204a-20: slob dbyings khyab par byed pa'i bsod nams gang zhig bdag gis thob gyur pa //
T02D1889:204a-21: des ni 'jig rten 'di dag dpe med pa yi rig mas 'khyud par 'gyur ba yi //
T02D1889:204a-22: mdzes pa'i sku las rgyal ba'i sprul pa dag gis
T02D1889:204a-23: 'gro ba'i don byed shog / de kho na nyid
T02D1889:204a-24: rin po che snang ba slob dpon ngag gi dbang
